title: Accurate player marker on map
description: Place the player marker at the precise chunk-relative position on the map instead of always centering it.

title: Prevent looting when inventory is full
description: Block picking up ground loot when inventory has no free slots. Show a brief message/indicator so players know inventory is full; leave items on the ground.

title: Add trash dropzone to destroy inventory items
description: Add a trash icon drop target in the inventory grid; dragging an item onto it removes the item permanently (with a hover highlight). Keep behavior consistent with drag gestures used for reorder/equip.

title: Plan save data model (player + world)
description: Design how to serialize/restore player entity (stats, inventory, equipment, progress) and world state. Document approach and identify hooks in ECS/scene flow.

title: Add inventory items in insertion order
description: Newly looted items should append to the next empty slot so inventory reads in pickup order instead of reverse/inverted order.

title: Map zoom with scroll wheel
description: Allow zooming the map view in/out via mouse scroll wheel with sensible limits and smooth scaling.

title: Main menu scene integrated with ECS
description: Add a main menu scene that fits the ECS/scene manager flow: entry point before gameplay, transitions cleanly into the existing world start.

title: Retro Diablo2D title art for main menu
description: Create/draw a retro pixel-art Diablo2D main title for the menu (placeholder art acceptable now), sized/styled to sit atop the menu.

title: Main menu options hookup
description: Menu entries: New Game (behaves like current launch flow), Load (stub for now), Options (route to existing options menu), Exit (quits). Ensure input/scene transitions work.

title: Hide cramped biome labels on fogged map
description: When a biome area isn't sufficiently revealed, skip rendering its name to avoid layout overlap until enough of that biome is discovered.

title: Map screen improvements
description: Epic for map UI/UX: zoom/pan controls, accurate player marker positioning, gated biome labels on undiscovered areas, and biome name under minimap.

title: Show current biome under minimap
description: Display the name of the current biome directly beneath the minimap so players always know their location context.

title: Add save slots to escape menu
description: Extend escape menu with a Save entry leading to five slots; allow saving into any slot, showing overwrite confirmation if needed.

title: Drag-and-drop inventory reordering and equip
description: Allow dragging items between inventory slots to reorder, and dragging onto equipment slots to equip (respect slot compatibility). Show placement highlight, allow swap with occupied slot, and persist new order. Cancelling drag should return item to original slot.

title: Inventory management improvements
description: Epic to track inventory usability changes: insertion-order placement, drag-and-drop reorder/equip, trash dropzone, and blocking pickup when full.

title: Main menu overhaul
description: Epic to add a proper main menu integrated with ECS/scenes, include retro Diablo2D title art, and hook up menu options (new, load placeholder, options, exit).

title: Enlarge damage numbers for clarity
description: Increase floating combat damage number size for better readability.

title: Show XP gain as floating numbers matching XP bar color
description: Display XP gain popups in-world using the XP bar color so gains are visible when earned.

title: Keyboard pan for map
description: Support panning the map using arrow keys; hold to scroll continuously and respect zoom level.

title: Wire load into main menu
description: Hook the Load option in the main menu to the save system, listing slots and loading selected data; initial implementation depends on main menu and save pipeline.

title: Save/restore system
description: Epic to design and implement save/load: plan data model covering player entity and world, add save UI with slots in escape menu, and hook load into main menu. Blocked on main menu epic.
